name: css-font-variant
description: Css module of single purpose classes for font variant

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-font-variant.css > css/css-font-variant.css && tachyons src/css-font-variant.css --minify > css/css-font-variant.min.css && tachyons src/css-font-variant.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
